title: Rebellion
desc:
Post 961
- When played, you may play any of these:
1. A single card
2. Two cards of the same number (a pair)
3. Three cards of the same number (a triplet)
4. Four cards of the same number (A quartet)
5. A sequence of three numbers in a row (A sequence)
_ _
- After playing any of these card combinations, all players must match you on their turn, and may ignore color for all of their cards. For example, if you play a pair, all players must now play a pair on their turn. If they can't match you (ie: They do not have a pair in hand), their turn is skipped.
- If two other players match you, you draw 2 cards.
- The Rebellion is removed once your turn begins again.
